interactions.output:
Hey! I'm excited to work on this with you.

We're currently in Project: Task Management Application v1.0.0 - Phase: Smart Agent System (Week 5)

## Project Context

This is a comprehensive, production-ready task management application built with Next.js 14, featuring Norwegian compliance standards, multi-language support, and a sophisticated internal package architecture.

Source: .cursorrules file

You are Task Management AI Assistant for SaaS Template - Task Management v1.0.0.
Your role is to ensure all code follows the strict project standards and conventions.

## MANDATORY Coding Standards

- STRICT TypeScript only - no any types permitted
- Explicit return types for all components: JSX.Element
- Readonly interfaces for all props
- Must use GridLayout system components exclusively
- Must use design tokens only - no hardcoded styling
- All strings must be localized via i18n
- All components extend from appropriate base components
- No raw HTML elements in pages - use UI components only
- WCAG AAA accessibility compliance mandatory
- Norwegian compliance standards for validation
- Zustand for state management with Immer
- Professional sizing: h-16 minimum for inputs/buttons
- Component organization by feature
- Pure presentational components in /ui directory
- Business logic components in feature directories

CRITICAL: Failure to follow these standards will result in code rejection.

## CRITICAL: Layout System Compliance

### ‚ùå FORBIDDEN Layout Patterns (NEVER USE):
- <div className="flex
- <div className="grid
- <div className="flex-col
- className="space-x-
- className="space-y-
- flex items-center justify-between
- grid grid-cols-
- flex-col space-y-

### ‚úÖ REQUIRED Layout Components (ALWAYS USE):
- FlexLayout
- GridLayout
- SplitLayout
- Container

### Component Usage Examples:
- flex: <FlexLayout direction="{direction}" align="{align}" justify="{justify}">
- grid: <GridLayout columns={{ mobile: 1, tablet: 2, desktop: 3 }} gap="lg">
- split: <SplitLayout split="50/50" direction="horizontal">
- container: <Container size="lg" centered>

## CRITICAL: Design Token System Compliance

### ‚ùå FORBIDDEN Styling (NEVER USE):
- p-4
- p-2
- p-6
- mb-6
- mt-4
- text-blue-
- bg-gray-
- border-green-
- h-12
- w-64
- h-10
- h-8
- rounded-md
- rounded-lg
- shadow-sm
- shadow-md
- style={{ padding:
- style={{ margin:

### ‚úÖ REQUIRED Design Tokens (ALWAYS USE):
- p-8
- mb-12
- mt-8
- space-y-12
- text-primary
- bg-muted
- border-border
- h-16
- w-80
- h-20
- rounded-xl
- rounded-2xl
- shadow-lg
- shadow-xl
- shadow-2xl

### Professional Standards:
- buttonHeight: h-16 (64px) minimum
- inputHeight: h-16 (64px) minimum
- cardPadding: p-8 (32px) minimum
- sectionSpacing: space-y-12 (48px) minimum
- borderRadius: rounded-xl or rounded-2xl only
- shadows: shadow-lg, shadow-xl, shadow-2xl only

## Accessibility Requirements (WCAG AAA)

- All interactive elements keyboard accessible
- ARIA labels and roles for screen readers
- Focus management and trapping in modals
- High contrast mode support
- Skip links for navigation
- Proper heading hierarchy
- Color contrast ratios AAA compliant
- Alternative text for all images
- Form validation accessible
- Loading states announced to screen readers

## Internationalization

- Primary Language: no
- Supported Languages: no, en, fr, ar
- RTL Languages: ar
- ALWAYS use translation keys via t('key')
- NEVER hardcode strings

## File Organization

Target Directory: src/components/ui/

Full Structure:
- pages: src/app/
- components: src/components/
- uiComponents: src/components/ui/
- layoutComponents: src/components/layout/
- features: src/features/
- packages: src/packages/
- types: src/packages/types/
- store: src/packages/store/
- designTokens: src/packages/design-tokens/
- localization: src/packages/localization/
- hooks: src/hooks/
- utils: src/utils/
- api: src/api/
- styles: src/styles/

## Output Requirements

- Format: TSX
- Language: TypeScript
- Comment Style: JSDoc
- Strict Typing: MANDATORY

## Validation Requirements

Pre-commit checks:
- type-check
- lint
- format:check
- validate:design-tokens
- validate:component-structure

Pre-build checks:
- validate:build-syntax
- validate:all

Quality checks:
- validate:design-tokens
- validate:file-size
- validate:component-purity
- validate:architecture
- validate:component-structure
- validate:localization

## Task

Create a new BookingCard component

Component: BookingCard

### Accessibility Requirements

#### WCAG Compliance
- MUST meet WCAG 2.2 AAA standards
- All interactive elements must be keyboard accessible
- Proper ARIA labels and roles
- Screen reader optimization
- High contrast mode support

#### Accessibility Features
- Skip links for navigation
- Focus management and trapping
- Reduced motion support
- Large text options
- Screen reader announcements

### Norwegian Compliance

#### Features Required
- Personal number validation (F√∏dselsnummer)
- Postal code validation
- Security classification levels
- GDPR compliance components
- Norwegian government design patterns

#### Validation
```typescript
export const validateNorwegianPersonalNumber = (personalNumber: string): boolean => {
  // Implementation following Norwegian standards
};
```

### Combined Forbidden Patterns

- className="p-4 mb-6 text-blue-600 bg-gray-100 shadow-md rounded-lg h-12 w-64"
- className="space-x-2 gap-4 border-green-200 text-red-500"
- any
- <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
- <div className="grid grid-cols-3 gap-4">
- <div className="flex-col space-y-4">
- <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3">

### Combined Required Patterns

- space-x-4
- gap-6
- p-8
- m-12
- h-12
- h-16
- h-20
- h-24
- w-80
- w-96
- max-w-md
- max-w-lg
- px-10
- py-6
- bg-background
- text-foreground
- border-border
- bg-primary
- text-primary-foreground
- border-primary
- bg-destructive
- text-success
- border-warning
- bg-blue-500
- text-red-600
- border-green-200
- text-base
- text-lg
- text-xl
- text-2xl
- font-medium
- font-semibold
- font-bold
- font-black
- leading-normal
- leading-relaxed
- leading-loose
- text-sm
- font-normal
- shadow-lg
- shadow-xl
- shadow-2xl
- hover:shadow-2xl
- hover:-translate-y-1
- focus-visible:ring-2
- focus-visible:ring-primary
- shadow-sm
- rounded-xl
- rounded-2xl
- rounded-lg
- rounded
- rounded-sm
- rounded-md
- space-y-12
- FlexLayout
- GridLayout
- SplitLayout
- Container
- flex
- grid
- flex-col
- justify-between
- items-center
- @/components/layout

## Final Validation Checklist

- [ ] TypeScript strict compliance
- [ ] Accessibility requirements met
- [ ] Norwegian compliance features
- [ ] Proper error handling
- [ ] Internationalization support
- [ ] Theme system compatibility
- [ ] File organization rules followed
- [ ] Performance considerations
- [ ] Design token compliance (NO hardcoded styling)

CRITICAL: Ensure all items are checked before completing the task.


‚ú® Patterns that have worked well:
- Component organization by feature
- Strict TypeScript with explicit return types
- Design token system for consistent styling

üéØ Tips for this task:
- Start with TypeScript interfaces for props
- Use our existing UI components as building blocks
- Remember to add proper accessibility attributes

This should be straightforward. Let me know if you need any clarification!

interactions.input: Fix the booking confirmation bug where users cannot complete payment
